title: 0.1 - Welcome to 30DaysOfAZD
description: Begin your month-long journey from AI fundamentals to production-ready solutions with Azure Developer CLI.

title: 1.1 - Introduction to Microsoft Foundry
description: Explore Microsoft Foundry as a unified platform for building, deploying, and managing AI applications with integrated tools and services.

title: 1.2 - Enterprise Retail AI Scenario
description: Understand real-world AI application architecture through a retail scenario with customer service automation and inventory management.

title: 1.3 - App Development Lifecycle
description: Learn the complete journey from ideation to production deployment, covering planning, development, testing, and operations.

title: 1.4 - AI App Architecture
description: Master key architectural patterns for AI applications including RAG, vector search, and multi-agent orchestration.

title: 1.5 - Manual Provisioning
description: Step through manual Azure resource creation to understand the foundational setup before automation with IaC tools.

title: 1.6 - ARM Templates
description: Explore Infrastructure as Code with ARM and Bicep templates for reproducible and version-controlled Azure deployments.

title: 1.7 - AZD Templates Introduction
description: Discover how Azure Developer CLI templates simplify cloud-native development with opinionated project structures and automation.

title: 2.1 - AZD Workflow
description: Understand the end-to-end AZD workflow from init to up, and how it streamlines cloud provisioning and deployment.

title: 2.2 - Installation & Commands
description: Install Azure Developer CLI across platforms and master essential commands for project management and deployment.

title: 2.3 - Finding Templates
description: Discover AZD templates through the gallery, GitHub repositories, and community resources for your project needs.

title: 2.4 - Creating Templates
description: Build custom AZD templates with proper structure, configuration files, and infrastructure definitions for reusability.

title: 2.5 - Deploying Templates
description: Deploy AZD templates to Azure with confidence, understanding provisioning, environment management, and troubleshooting.

title: 2.6 - Deconstructing Templates
description: Analyze existing AZD templates to understand their architecture, configuration patterns, and best practices.

title: 2.7 - AZD Extensions
description: Extend AZD functionality with hooks, custom scripts, and integrations to customize your deployment workflow.

title: 3.1 - AI Agents Template
description: Introduction to production-ready AI Agents templates with multi-agent orchestration and real-world use cases.

title: 3.2 - Deploy & Explore
description: Deploy an AI Agents template to Azure and explore the provisioned resources, services, and application structure.

title: 3.3 - Repository Structure
description: Understand the organization of an AI Agents codebase including app code, infrastructure, configuration, and tests.

title: 3.4 - Search & Models
description: Examine how AI Search and language models work together to provide intelligent, context-aware responses.

title: 3.5 - Tracing & Application
description: Implement observability with distributed tracing to monitor agent behavior, performance, and debugging insights.

title: 3.6 - Agent Evaluations
description: Evaluate AI agent quality with automated testing, metrics collection, and continuous improvement workflows.

title: 3.7 - Agent Extensions
description: Extend agent capabilities with custom tools, plugins, and integrations for domain-specific functionality.

title: 4.1 - Modify Template
description: Hands-on exercise to customize an existing AZD template for your specific requirements and use case.

title: 4.2 - Deploy Solution
description: Deploy your customized solution to Azure, validate functionality, and troubleshoot common deployment issues.

title: 4.3 - Model Creation
description: Build and integrate AI models using Azure OpenAI, custom models, or open-source alternatives in your application.

title: 4.4 - Agent Creation
description: Create custom AI agents from scratch with proper orchestration, memory management, and tool integration.

title: 4.5 - Idea to Prototype
description: Rapidly prototype AI solutions from concept to working demo using Azure AI SDK and development best practices.

title: 4.6 - Prototype to Production
description: Transform prototypes into production-ready applications with security, scalability, and monitoring considerations.

title: 4.7 - Production to Adoption
description: Manage deployed applications with CI/CD, monitoring, user feedback, and continuous improvement strategies.

title: 5.1 - Course Recap & Next Steps
description: Celebrate your journey and explore what comes next as you continue building production-ready AI solutions.
